rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with storage and a display area, following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
An open living space that seamlessly connects to the kitchen. The design respects Chettinad style aesthetics with local art and stone accents.
A functional kitchen designed with cost-effective materials; includes ample storage while adhering to Vastu guidelines for food preparation.
Dedicated home office space on the ground floor, with built-in shelves and ergonomic seating. Placed away from noisy areas to enhance productivity in line with Vastu.
A quiet library area designed for reading and research, incorporating natural light and soundproofing elements. Decorative elements are inspired by traditional Chettinad interiors.
A compact yet functional bathroom with modern fixtures that respect space constraints and local building codes.

openings.description: A main entrance door placed at the front corner of the plot to maximize space usage and natural ventilation.
Multiple windows ensuring cross-ventilation and adequate daylight per Vastu guidelines.
A service entrance door for utilities and additional storage, strategically located to maintain aesthetic flow.
